effect.en: Put a Pokémon Tool card from your discard pile into your hand.
effect.fr: Ajoutez une carte Outil Pokémon de votre pile de défausse à votre main.
effect.es: Pon 1 carta de Herramienta Pokémon de tu pila de descartes en tu mano.
effect.it: Prendi una carta Oggetto Pokémon dalla tua pila degli scarti e aggiungila alle carte che hai in mano.
effect.pt: Coloque uma carta de Ferramenta Pokémon da sua pilha de descarte na sua mão.
effect.de: Nimm 1 Pokémon-Ausrüstung aus deinem Ablagestapel auf deine Hand.

description.en: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It'll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.
